price: 18. Sourds, muets, aveugles, ils ne reviendront pas.[13]
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: [13] De leur erreur. Leur égarement est irréversible, arrivé comme il l’est au point de non-retour.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
